arts.ttl: Liverpool Need £60M Offer to Secure Man City, Man Utd Target as PSG Hold Sell-On
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain initially opted for a short-term solution by loaning Xavi Simons to RB Leipzig for another season. However, his future is now somewhat settled, as the German club has secured him on a permanent transfer. Last September, journalist Christian Falk reported that Manchester City and Liverpool were closely following Simons’ situation. arts.ttl: Barcelona’s Stance on £150M-Rated Newcastle Star Amid Liverpool, PSG Links Revealed
arts.sum: The winter transfer window has closed, and Alexander Isak remains at Newcastle United—for now. While there wasn’t much speculation about a move this winter, plenty of clubs will likely be watching him closely this summer. arts.ttl: Man City, PSG’s €20M-Per-Year Target in Talks With Other Clubs Amid Liverpool Links
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain have been monitoring Bayern Munich midfielder Joshua Kimmich for months and nearly signed him last summer. Now, it appears the veteran is open to considering offers. arts.ttl: PSG Replicating AC Milan’s Early 1990s Dominance Over Ligue 1, Stat Reveals
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain edged out Toulouse FC with a 1-0 win on Saturday night at Stadium de Toulouse. After a scoreless first half, both teams pushed to break the deadlock. PSG registered 13 shots, while Carles Martínez Novell’s side managed five. arts.ttl: PSG beat Toulouse; remain unbeaten in Ligue 1
arts.sum: Fabián Ruiz's second-half strike secured a 1-0 win for Paris Saint-Germain at Toulouse on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Liverpool Provide Concerning Injury Update on Key Players Ahead of Potential PSG Clash
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain cruised to a 3-0 win over Stade Brestois in the first leg of their UEFA Champions League knockout play-off on Tuesday night at Stade de Roudourou, with Ousmane Dembélé scoring twice. Unless Brest pulls off a major comeback, PSG will face either Barcelona or Liverpool in the Round of 16. arts.ttl: Video: PSG Gets Lucky Break as Fabian Ruiz Opens Scoring Against Toulouse
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain and Toulouse played to a scoreless first half, but minutes into the second half, the Ligue 1 leaders broke the deadlock thanks to one player being at the right place at the right time. arts.ttl: Tottenham, Roma €50M-Rated January Target Gives Three-Word Response on Juve Future as PSG Return Unlikely
arts.sum: Randal Kolo Muani has made an impressive start to his Serie A career, scoring five goals in his first three matches. Paris Saint-Germain is hopeful that his successful loan at Juventus will attract suitors ahead of the summer transfer window. arts.ttl: Aston Villa, PSG Poised to Rival Arsenal, Man Utd for €60M-Rated Serie A Star
